summary: <![CDATA[Last week, kharif sowing picked up further pace with 75 per cent of the normal area being covered. Kharif sowing is set to get support from the weather with the India Meteorological Department (IMD) predicting above-normal rainfall during August-September.

<![CDATA[Sensex, Nifty, Share Prices LIVE: Indian markets opened on a cautious note Monday amid lingering uncertainty over the US-India trade deal. As of 10:07 p.m., the Sensex was up 280 points at 80,880, while the Nifty gained 104 points to reach 24,669.
